Package common

Class BorrowedBook

java.lang.Object
common.BorrowedBook
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class BorrowedBook extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a borrowed book record, including borrowed and return dates and references to the borrowed Book.
See Also:
